| HistoryText             = The Black Host is an army of rogue [[Angels (Monotheism)|Angels]], loyal only to [[Zadkiel (Earth-616)|Zadkiel]].{{r|Ghost Rider Vol 6 27}}

Both in [[Heaven (Paradise)|Heaven]] and on [[Earth]], the Black Host will do what is necessary for their master to overthrow the kingdom of God. Most recently, the Black Host fought under the command of [[Daniel Ketch (Earth-616)|Daniel Ketch]] to obtain the powers of the last remaining [[Spirits of Vengeance]]. When the smoke cleared, Ketch and the army of rogue angels by his side emerged victorious, and Zadkiel won his war with Heaven.{{r|Ghost Rider Vol 6 30|32}}
